Reviews.Title: “Full of BEDBUGS horrible everything”
Reviews.Author: AnnieO_70
Reviews.Content: stayed days terrible service unfriendly clean noticed marks boyfriend itchy marks didnt realize bed bugs till doctor confirmed bed bugs packed hotel refused refund couldnt believe argued pay doctor hotel cares grabbing money screwing customer dont dont

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY IN THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: oreoToronto
Reviews.Content: numerous troubles towels changed request 3 days facecloths hand towels soap shampoo towels repeatedly available advertise air conditioning rarely weekend hot dirty smelled bedding changed requests garbage removed refund told wait management arrive suggested times manager finally arrived told late day luckily friend close hotel able move extra cost staff except day person pretended understand english english french language communication frustrating

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel de L'Elysee
HotelInfo.Address: 1633, rue Saint-Hubert, Montreal, Quebec H2L 3Z1, Canada
